Sing a song loudly in a public place.
Write a paragraph with your left hand.
Imitate a celebrity for one minute.
Post a funny selfie on your social media.
Do 20 push-ups right where you are.
Take a photo of something interesting in your current location and share it.
Dance for one minute without music in your present surroundings.
Find something blue in your vicinity and describe it to the group.
Pretend to be a tour guide and give a short tour of your current location.
Take a short video explaining why you love or dislike the place you're in.
